item.title: Homeserver Upgrade, Part 0: The Plan
item.description: Around September last year the fourth memory card in a row failed in the Raspberry Pi 3 that powered my home setup. I canvassed the house for parts, threw together a Frankenstein-style monstrosity, built what became Jarvis on it and called it a day. Since then the use case expanded - so it’s time for an upgrade.
